solution_code: public class Solution {--newline--    public int rob(TreeNode root) {--newline--        int[] res = robSub(root);--newline--        return Math.max(res[0], res[1]);--newline--    }--newline--    --newline--    private int[] robSub(TreeNode root) {--newline--        if (root == null) return new int[2];--newline--        --newline--        int[] left = robSub(root.left);--newline--        int[] right = robSub(root.right);--newline--        int[] res = new int[2];--newline--    --newline--        res[0] = Math.max(left[0], left[1]) + Math.max(right[0], right[1]);--newline--        res[1] = root.val + left[0] + right[0];--newline--        --newline--        return res;--newline--    }--newline--}
